sentences.en: Cash machines that spew out money are usually the stuff of dreams.
sentences.cn: 现金出纳机里的钱,通常是梦想.

sentences.en: Electric vehicles are quiet and spew no emissions.
sentences.cn: 电动车安静而且不排污.

sentences.en: Factory chimneys spewed fumes out into the sky.
sentences.cn: 工厂的烟囱向空中喷吐浓烟。

sentences.en: I will punish Bel in Babylon and make him spew out what he has swallowed.
sentences.cn: 我必刑罚巴比伦的彼勒,使他吐出所吞的.

sentences.en: One of the ways to purify water is to make It'spew slowly from the soil.
sentences.cn: 净化水的方法之一是让它从土中慢慢地渗出.

sentences.en: She must be purged and through this purgation her bowels shall spew.
sentences.cn: 她必须被净化,通过这净化,她的内容物将会喷出.

sentences.en: She must purged and through this purgation her bowels shall spew.
sentences.cn: 她必须被净化,经由这净化,她的内部将喷涌.

sentences.en: Soon you shall hear and feel the belly of this planet roar, hiccup belch and spew.
sentences.cn: 很快你们会听到感觉到这个星球的腹部轰鸣, 呃逆,迸发,喷涌.

sentences.en: The editors of the paper spew out hostile articles about the presidential candidate.
sentences.cn: 论文编辑剔除了对该总统候选人有敌意的文章.

sentences.en: The Mutalisk can spew forth Glaive Wurms which seek out nearby targets and punish them.
sentences.cn: 飞龙可以吐出弹射虫来攻击附近的目标.

sentences.en: They also spew toxic chemicals such as benzene and dioxin into the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 还向大气中排放诸如苯及二氧芑之类的有毒化学品.

trans.tran_en: to flow out of something quickly in large quantities, or to make something flow out in this way

trans.tran_cn: 呕吐，（使某事物）喷出，涌出，射出，渗出
